data.text: You people of Israel, do not shout joyfully during your festivals like people of other nations do!
But soon there will not be enough grain [MTY, PRS] and wine [MTY, PRS] for you.
And you people will not remain in the land that I, Yahweh, gave to your ancestors.
You Israelis will not be able to give wine offerings to him,
At that time you will not [RHQ] be able to celebrate the feasts and sacred festivals.
And even if you escape and are not killed by the Assyrians,
It is now the time for Yahweh to punish you,
My God appointed me and the other prophets
The sins that the Israeli people have committed are as awful as what the men of Gibeah did long ago;
Yahweh says, “When I first started to do things to help Israel,
The things that cause Israel to be great will disappear
Even if their children are born and start to grow up,
I have seen Israel become beautiful and prosperous like Tyre city was before it was destroyed,
Yahweh, I do not know [RHQ] what I should ask for my people.
Yahweh says, “Because of all the wicked things that my people did at Gilgal,
Israel is like [MET] a grapevine that is dried up;
The people of Israel have not obeyed me, their God,
